ygData.subject: Re: Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: It appears my original point has been lost.  I do not want the pet to be stronger as much as I want it to attack whatever I tell it to and defend me from all
ygData.messageBody:
It appears my original point has been lost. I do not want the pet to be
stronger as much as I want it to attack whatever I tell it to and defend me
from all attackers. It currently does not do this.


>From: "Michael Wooldirdge" <dark@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Pets
>Date: Mon, 5 Jul 1999 13:29:54 -0400
>
>ShadowKnight pets are not going to be improved anymore and for good reason.
>You increase them anymore and your really beginning to come out of the
>Shadow Knight spells and move into the Necromancer spells. If you wanted
>powerful pets then you should of been a Necromancer. ShadowKnights are 3/4
>warrior and 1/4 Necromancer not the other way around. Your spells are used
>as support nothing more.
